entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Brockville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:47 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brockville 06:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
Temperature: -6.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -6.8°C
Wind: N 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near noon. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
